column4: hi guys, is there another good alternative to skype on the linux platform ?
skype is proprietary, there are only alternatives to skype. the protocol it uses will be different though
I did use ekiga for a while but did not find it very stable
Here are 4 alternatives: http://ostatic.com/blog/say-hello-to-5-voip-solutions-for-linux   Non skype clients will not talk to skype clients
